Remote Note : Bank of America stores all credit card information in their secured payment vault.

The CVV Number ("Card Verification Value") on your credit card or debit card is a 3 digit number on VISA®, MasterCard® and Discover® branded credit and debit cards. On your American Express® branded credit or debit card it is a 4 digit numeric code.

This password has previously appeared %1$d times in a data breach and should never be used. If you\'ve ever used it anywhere before, change it immediately! It is not possible to say which data breach the password was found in, just that it was found in at least one.
This password wasn\'t found in any of the pwned? passwords loaded into Have I Been Pwned?. That doesn\'t necessarily mean it\'s a good password, merely that it\'s not indexed.
Good news! %1$s has not been found in any public data breaches!

This app collects location data to enable to ensure we get the most accurate data and minimize any manipulation of time spent inside of any active geofence even when the app is closed or not in use.

Your donation will help Keep Safe 911 app to incorporate better image recognition, international language support and develop additional database resources.

Keep Safe 911 - a percentage of your donation will be sent to the missing kids foundation.
